meanings.definition: Maltases: enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of maltose to glucose.
meanings.sent1: The maltases in our bodies help break down maltose into glucose for energy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study maltases to understand how maltose is converted into glucose.
meanings.sent3: The maltases at the maltose party were busy turning all the maltose into glucose.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the maltases, breaking down obstacles into achievable steps.
meanings.sent5: The classroom demonstration vividly showed how maltases work on maltose molecules.
